13 template <typename VoxelType>
14 class LayerUtilsTest : public ::testing::Test,
15  public voxblox::test::LayerTest<VoxelType> {
16  protected:
17  void initializeSimulatedWorld() {
18  world_.reset(new Layer<VoxelType>(voxel_size_, voxels_per_side_));
19 
20  SimulationWorld simulation;
21  Point lower_bound, upper_bound;
22  lower_bound << -0.51, -0.51, -0.51;
23  upper_bound << 0.9, 0.9, 0.9;
24  expected_new_coordinate_origin_ << 0.16, 0.16, 0.16;
25 
26  simulation.setBounds(lower_bound, upper_bound);
27 
28  // Define sphere 1.
29  Point c1_A;
30  c1_A << 0.104, 0.104, 0.106;
31  constexpr FloatingPoint sphere_1_radius_m = 0.05;
32 
33  // Define sphere 2.
34  Point c2_A;
35  c2_A << -0.104, 0.103, 0.203;
36  constexpr FloatingPoint sphere_2_radius_m = 0.03;
37 
38  // Define sphere 3.
39  Point c3_A;
40  c3_A << 0.401, 0.151, 0.203;
41  constexpr FloatingPoint sphere_3_radius_m = 0.075;
42 
43  // Prepare world A
44  simulation.addObject(std::unique_ptr<Object>(
45  new Sphere(c1_A, sphere_1_radius_m, Color(255u, 0u, 0u))));
46  simulation.addObject(std::unique_ptr<Object>(
47  new Sphere(c2_A, sphere_2_radius_m, Color(255u, 0u, 0u))));
48  simulation.addObject(std::unique_ptr<Object>(
49  new Sphere(c3_A, sphere_3_radius_m, Color(255u, 0u, 0u))));
50  simulation.generateSdfFromWorld(max_distance_world, world_.get());
51  }
52 
53  virtual void SetUp() { initializeSimulatedWorld(); }
54 
55  typename Layer<VoxelType>::Ptr world_;
56 
57  Point expected_new_coordinate_origin_;
58 
59  const double voxel_size_ = 0.005;
60  const size_t voxels_per_side_ = 16u;
61  const double max_distance_world = 2.0;
62 
63  static constexpr FloatingPoint kPrecision = 1e-6;
64 };
